description: Governs telemetry signature coverage for every topic interaction emitted by RenderX-Web plugins.

analysis.notes: Telemetry extraction parses conductor logs for [topic:<name>] signatures so the SLO dashboard and self-healing agents can reconcile live interactions.
analysis.pipeline: plugin -> json-sequences -> pre:manifest -> interactions -> JSON-component-interaction-integration -> live-session-conductor-logs -> telemetry-extraction

name: unknown
